content.description: Straight up the hand sized crack about 20' high. Large enough to get fingers behind for a good grip. Uneven decorative rock makes for nice foot holds. Top out on to the road or set a belay from the concrete barriers.
content.protection:
Setup a top rope anchor from the concrete barriers.

 Be mindful of on-coming traffic.
content.location: Start on the bottom of the west side of the Gerault bridge that merges Eastbound on Long Prairie / 2499. The crack is under the second light post going with the flow of traffic to the South.

content.description: Merger of Gerault and 2499 / Long Prairie Rd.
